Name: Percentage of cases where 'Request Payment' occurs without any prior 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Request Payment' following the variant path that includes 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' but excludes 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' executions out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' events that occur in cases where the process variant contains exactly one approval step before final supervisor approval (e.g., skipping budget owner or pre-approver)
Percentage of variants ending with 'Request Payment' → 'Payment Handled' that never include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' activities preceded directly by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without any intervening rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' events associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of total completed reimbursement cycles (ending in 'Payment Handled') that include 'Request Payment' and avoid any rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of the shortest successful variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled) compared to variants involving PRE_APPROVER rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' occurrences that belong to cases with no rework loops caused by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of 'Request Payment' executions in variants that include 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' (without rejection) versus those that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' events per distinct 'case:BudgetNumber' where no 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurred in the case history
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of all 'Request Payment' instances that are part of the top three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Request Payment' appearing in cases that required more than two submission attempts due to any rejection, including 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Request Payment' in cases originating from declarations first submitted in 2018 versus 2017
